sentences.sContent: After chemical assay, we have known the composition of the ore.
sentences.sContent_eng: After chemical assay, we have known the composition of the ore.
sentences.sCn: 经过化学分析，我们知道了矿石的构成。

synos.tran: 鉴定；经检验证明内含成分

phrases.pCn: 酶联免疫吸附测定，酶标法

remMethod.val: as (正如) + say (说) → 正如医生的化验结果那样 → 化验

words.tran: 试金者，尝试者；分析专家

trans.tranCn: 鉴定，化验，分析〔尤指金属纯度或成分等〕
trans.tranOther: to test a substance, especially a metal, to see how pure it is or what it is made of
